Package com.hfych2.brickdestroy.model

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Ball
    This class is the super class for RubberBall.
    This class will be the super class for all ball objects which may be extended in the future.
    This class defines the general behaviour of all ball objects.
    BallTest  
    Brick
    The nested class, Crack was extracted from this class of the original code.
    This class is the super class for ClayBrick, CementBrick SteelBrick, GoldBrick.
    This class will be the super class for all brick objects which may be extended in the future.
    This class defines the general behaviour for all brick objects.
    CementBrick
    This class is brick of type Cement and the only brick type with strength of 2.
    This class is the only brick type that draw cracks on impact for this version.
    ClayBrick
    This class is brick of type Clay with strength of 1.
    Crack
    This class is extracted from Brick of the original code.
    GameBoard
    Both GameView and GameController are extracted from this class of the original code.
    This class has been modified from the original code along with having additions to become a model class.
    This class is the model class for the view GameView and the controller GameController
    GameBoardTest  
    GoldBrick
    This class is a newly created class that is not from the original code.
    This class is brick of type Gold which is broken with a probability as specified as GoldBrick.GOLD_PROBABILITY
    Impacts
    This class is extracted from Wall of the original code.
    This class defines the corresponding updates to be performed by the related components when impacts are detected.
    Levels
    This class is extracted from Wall of the original code and has been modified along with having additions.
    This class defines all the possible levels of the game.
    LevelsTest  
    Player
    This class defines the player.
    PlayerTest  
    RubberBall
    This class is a ball of type Rubber.
    This class is the current type of ball used for all levels.
    ScoreSorting
    This class is a newly created class that is not from the original code.
    This class is used for score sorting functionality on sorting the highScoresList.txt
    SteelBrick
    This class is brick of type Steel which is broken with a probability specified as SteelBrick.STEEL_PROBABILITY.
    User
    This class is a newly created class that is not from the original code.
    This class is to temporarily store user information in Arraylists before writing to highScoresList.txt
    Wall
    Levels, Impacts is extracted from this class, whereas anything else unrelated to a wall of bricks is moved into GameBoard.
    This class is the wall of bricks in all levels.
    WallTest
